snippet: Park workers found ammunition when they removed a plug in an 18th-century cannon’s barrel, a police spokesman said, then they dialed 911.
abstract: Central Park workers cleaning Revolutionary War-era cannon find that it had remained loaded with gunpowder and a cannonball, read to fire, apparently since 18th century; Police Dept bomb squad defuses the artifact.
lead_paragraph: Park workers found ammunition when they removed a plug in an 18th-century cannon’s barrel, a police spokesman said, then they dialed 911.

headline.seo: Antique Cannon Found Loaded in Central Park
headline.main: Antique Cannon in Central Park Found Loaded
headline.print_headline: Antique Cannon in Central Park Found Loaded
